CustomField.description: Fields used for Integration with Quickbooks.
CustomField.formula: IF( fw1__Entity__r.Name = "SCS Global", fw1__Account__r.Quickbooks_ID__c, IF( fw1__Entity__r.Name = "SCS Consulting", fw1__Account__r.QBConsulting_ID__c, IF( fw1__Entity__r.Name = "Ivory Coast", fw1__Account__r.QBIvory_ID__c, "")))
CustomField.label: Account Quickbooks ID
